channel.title: Disconnected on connection [317/delta]
channel.description:
I've tried removing random codes that have "disconnect = true" that look like they might help but none do...
Everytime someone tries to connect with a different client it disconnects them immidiatly after connecting. I'm using delta so plz help.
This is what happens [code][Troy] Connected Game saved for Troy [Troy] Disconnected[/code]

item.title: Disconnected on connection [317/delta]
item.dc:creator: @Cowarooroo Cowarooroo
item.description:
@Cowarooroo wrote:

I Vain I:

Configure the server-to-client & client-to-server packets.

How?

Read full topic

item.title: Disconnected on connection [317/delta]
item.dc:creator: @freedom522 freedom522
item.description:
@freedom522 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Cache is glitched, or the packets or incorrectly configured.
Most likely, client isn’t compatible.[/quote]

our client allows us to log on but any other client wont work, so is there any way we can make that client compatable.

Read full topic

item.title: Disconnected on connection [317/delta]
item.dc:creator: @freedom522 freedom522
item.description:
@freedom522 wrote:

when you try to connect with any other client, (im using silabsoft in this case) you get this error if that helps.

Error: T2 - 126,126,126 - 12,0,0 - 80,111,105,110,116,115,58,32,48,10,76,-59,

Read full topic

if (!(UID == Your UID)) { disconnected = true;
?[/quote]

No sorry
